properties.body:
GULF OF MEXICO.
TEXAS TO MEXICO.
1. 44 FOOT S/V TROPICAL FUN, WHITE HULL, FOUR PERSONS
   ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 23-00.1N 091-57.6W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NEW ORLEANS,
   PHONE: 504 589 6225, E-MAIL: D8COMMANDCENTER@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 515/14.
